K08bsu029_u:366: bahukalpakoṭībhi kadāci buddho utpadyate lokahito maharṣiḥ /
K08bsu029_u:367: labdho 'dhunā sa pravaraḥ kṣaṇo 'dya tyaja pramādaṃ yadi mokṣakāmaḥ // 91 //
K08bsu029_u:368: catvāra ime rāṣṭrapāla pudgalā bodhisattvena na sevitavyāḥ /
K08bsu029_u:370: pāpamitraṃ rāṣṭrapāla pudgalo bodhisattvena na sevitavyaḥ /
K08bsu029_u:371: upalambhadṛṣṭiko rāṣṭrapāla pudgalo bodhisattvena na sevitavyaḥ /
K08bsu029_u:372: saddharmapratikṣepakaḥ pudgalo rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvena na sevitavyaḥ /
K08bsu029_u:373: āmiṣalolupaḥ pudgalo rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvena na sevitavyaḥ /
K08bsu029_u:374: ime rāṣṭrapāla catvāraḥ pudgalā bodhisattvena na sevitavyāḥ //
K08bsu029_u:375: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K08bsu029_u:376: ye pāpamitrāṇi vivarjayanti kalpāṇamitrāṇi sadā bhajanti /
K08bsu029_u:377: vardhanti te bodhipatheṣu nityaṃ yatha śuklapakṣe divi candramaṇḍalam // 92 //
K08bsu029_u:378: upalambhadṛṣṭyāṃ ca sadā niviṣṭā ātme niviṣṭāstatha jīvapoṣe /
K08bsu029_u:379: viṣakumbhavatte sada varjayanti ye buddhajñānena bhavanti arthikāḥ // 93 //
K08bsu029_u:380: kṣipanti ye dharma narottamānāṃ śāntaṃ virāgamamṛtānukūlam /
K08bsu029_u:381: tān varjayenmīḍhaghaṭāṃ yathaiva ya icchate budhyitumagrabodhim // 94 //
K08bsu029_u:382: adhyoṣitā āmiṣa pātracīvare kulasaṃstave caiva sadābhiyuktāḥ /
K08bsu029_u:383: kurvīta sārdhaṃ na hi teṣu saṃstavaṃ tān varjayedagnikhadhāṃ (khadāṃ) yathaiva // 95 //
K08bsu029_u:384: yasyepsitaṃ dharṣayituṃ hi māraṃ pravartituṃ cakravaraṃ hyanuttaram /
K08bsu029_u:385: sattvārthamevaṃ vipulaṃ ca kartuṃ varjyāśca tenāpi ca pāpamitrāḥ // 96 //
K08bsu029_u:386: vivarjayitvā ca priyāpriyāṇi lābhaṃ yaśo bhaṇḍanamānamīrṣyām /
K08bsu029_u:387: eṣeta nityaṃ sada buddhajñānaṃ ya icchate budhyitumagrabodhim // 97 //
K08bsu029_u:389: catvāra ime rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvānāṃ duḥkhavipākā dharmāḥ /
K08bsu029_u:396: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K08bsu029_u:397: dharmadharā bhuvi ye tu bhavanti pūjita sarvajageṣu bhavanti /
K08bsu029_u:400: viṣameṇa sa deśati bhogen chandaruciḥ sada jñāni aśuddhe /
K08bsu029_u:401: mānonnata yaśca hi nityaṃ namate guruāryajaneṣu // 99 //
K08bsu029_u:402: adhimukti na vidyati buddhe dharmagaṇe ca na tasyadhimuktiḥ /
K08bsu029_u:404: sa itaścyuto hi manujeṣu karmavaśādabudho hi vimūḍhaḥ /
K08bsu029_u:405: narakeṣvatha tiryaggatiṣu pretagatiṣu ca vandati duḥkham / 101 //
K08bsu029_u:407: tena apāyapathaṃ pravihāya bodhipathaḥ satataṃ hi niṣevyaḥ // 102 //
K08bsu029_u:412: anigṛhītacittasya jñānavirahitasya pramādasevanatā rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvasya bandhanam /
K08bsu029_u:415: atha khalu bhagavaṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K08bsu029_u:416: avamanyati nitya parasya bhāvayate sada laukikadhyānam /
K08bsu029_u:417: badhyati tebhi sa dṛṣṭiśatebhiḥ paṅki gajo yatha durbalakāyaḥ // 103 //
K08bsu029_u:421: so avamanyana manyana tyaktvā yujyati bodhipathe satataṃ ca // 105 //
K08bsu029_u:423: tyaktva priyāpriyajñātramaśeṣaṃ buddha bhavanti vikalmaṣa dhīrāḥ // 106 //
K08bsu029_u:427: kalpa acintiya pūrva carantaḥ sattvahitāya caran varabodhau /
K08bsu029_u:428: dānadame niyame 'pi ca nityaṃ susthita āsi tyajitva ca jñātīn // 108 //
K08bsu029_u:429: prāntavane sada nitya rato 'haṃ śoṣita āśrayu bodhinidānam /
K08bsu029_u:430: na ca saṃsṛtu vīryaṃ kadācideṣata jñāna mahāpuruṣāṇām // 109 //
K08bsu029_u:432: kṛtva kṛpāṃ vipulāmiha pūrve ārjita bodhi balājjagadarthe // 110 //
K08bsu029_u:433: duhitṛsvasutāḥ priyabhāryāḥ tyakta purā dhanadhānya prabhūtāḥ /
K08bsu029_u:434: jīvita iṣṭa mahī susamṛddhā eṣata bodhivarāṃ bahukalpān // 111 //
K08bsu029_u:435: phalapuṣpajalāḍhya suramya āsi vane muni kṣāntirato 'ham /
K08bsu029_u:436: chinna karau caraṇau kalirājñā naiva mano 'pi tadā mama duṣṭam // 112 //
K08bsu029_u:437: vanakandari śyāmaku nāma āsi munirbharato gurujīrṇo /
K08bsu029_u:440: kāye na ca me na ca jīve bodhinimittamavekṣya babhūva // 114 //
K08bsu029_u:444: śoṣitu ratnanidāna samudraḥ prāpya maṇiṃ sukhitāḥ kṛta sattvāḥ // 116 //
K08bsu029_u:447: duḥkhita vīkṣya naraṃ ca daridraṃ tyakta mayā priyameva śarīram /
K08bsu029_u:448: prāpya dhanaṃ sa kṛtaśca mayāḍhyaḥ sarvadadena nṛpeṇa satā me // 118 //
K08bsu029_u:449: śaraṇāgata vīkṣya kapotaṃ svaṃ piśitaṃ vinikṛtya śarīrāt /
K08bsu029_u:450: dattamapi svatanurna bhayārtastyakta ihāpi nṛpeṇa satā me // 119 //
K08bsu029_u:452: jīvita tyajya parasya dadau taṃ kesarirāja babhūva yadāham // 120 //
K08bsu029_u:454: caratā ca purā jagadarthe madri pativrata tyakta saputrā /
K08bsu029_u:457: uttaptavīryu yada āsīt arthadhanaśriyo 'pi ca purā me // 122 //
K08bsu029_u:459: pūjā kṛtā daśabalānām āsi nṛpātmaji vimalatejāḥ // 123 //
K08bsu029_u:460: raudrākṣa eva ca ruṣitvā yācitavān sa cāpi mama śīrṣam /
K08bsu029_u:461: dattaṃ nikṛtya ca mayā tad rāja yadā ca candraprabha āsīt // 124 //
K08bsu029_u:463: sattvārtha sthāpit mayā te puṇyasamo babhūva ca yadāham // 125 //
K08bsu029_u:465: tyaktāṃ pūrvabhaveṣu caratā me āsi yadā śubho nṛpati pūrve // 126 //
K08bsu029_u:467: tyaktaśca me makuṭa pūrva āsi nṛpo yadā ratanacūḍaḥ // 127 //
K08bsu029_u:469: tyaktau karau sacaraṇau me pūrva nṛpeṇa dhṛtimatā ca // 128 //
K08bsu029_u:471: kṛta mānuṣā badaradvīpe siṃhala sārthavāha yada āsīt // 129 //
K08bsu029_u:472: kāmeṣu mṛrcchitamanā me bāli sa rākṣasī pramadasaṃjñā /
K08bsu029_u:473: pañcaśatāni vaṇijānāṃ mokṣita te yadā bhave sunetraḥ // 130 //
K08bsu029_u:475: pravrajya nirgatu jinasya śāsane puṇyaraśmi yada āsīt // 131 //
K08bsu029_u:476: mayi tyaktamaṅguli udārā sattvahitārthameva caratā me /
K08bsu029_u:477: jālārcitā vimalaśuddhā kāñcanavarṇa pārthiva yada āsīt // 132 //
K08bsu029_u:479: tyaktā mayā ca jagadarthe utpalanetre pārthiva yadāsīt // 133 //
K08bsu029_u:481: parimocitā karuṇayā me keśava vaidyarāja yada āsīt // 134 //
K08bsu029_u:482: vyādhyāturaṃ ca naramīkṣya svaṃ rudhiraṃ pradattamapi me 'bhūt /
K08bsu029_u:483: nirvyādhitaḥ sa ca kṛto me prāgbhava sarvadarśi yadabhūvam // 135 //
K08bsu029_u:485: hitvā svamasthi ca śarīrād vyādhikṛśasya majja mayā dattam /
K08bsu029_u:486: na ca sattva tyakta maya jātu āsi nṛpo yadā kusuma nāma // 136 //
K08bsu029_u:487: sarvasvakośamapi tyaktva jīvita tyakta me priya manāpam /
K08bsu029_u:488: naru mokṣito vyasanaprāpta āsi nṛpo 'rthasiddhi yada pūrvam // 137 //
K08bsu029_u:490: nṛpa āśuketu yada āsīd bodhimabhīpsamāna jagadarthe // 138 //
K08bsu029_u:491: nṛpa sarvadarśi yada āsīt kāruṇiko janārthahitakāmaḥ /
K08bsu029_u:492: tyaktā mayā caturo 'pi ca dvīpāḥ sphītanarairvranarīśataiśca // 139 //
K08bsu029_u:493: mṛdu komalaṃ vikalagauraṃ ūru tacchittva hṝṣṭamuditāyā /
K08bsu029_u:494: dattaṃ svamāṃsa rudhiraṃ me jñānavatī yadāsi nṛpaputrī // 140 //
K08bsu029_u:496: strī prekṣya me kṣudhatṛṣārtaṃ sā rūpya (pa ?)
K08bsu029_u:500: rājñaḥ suto tu vikṛtajñaḥ tārita sāgarādyada kṛtajñaḥ /
K08bsu029_u:501: ratnārtha netra mama tena uddhṛta naiva me ruṣita cittam // 143 //
K08bsu029_u:502: mā bhūtpipīlikavadho me tyakta varāśrayo 'pi canapekṣya /
K08bsu029_u:503: na ca citta kampita tadā me tyakta pūrvabhaveṣu godha yada āsīt // 144 //
K08bsu029_u:505: na ca mānavānapi ca stabdha āsi kapiṃjalo vicaramāṇaḥ // 145 //
K08bsu029_u:506: śaraṇāgatasya ca mayārthe tyakta samucchrayaḥ kṛpa janitvā /
K08bsu029_u:507: na ca tyakta vānaragatena vyādhanaraḥ śarābhinihatena // 146 //
K08bsu029_u:508: gajavaśagatena śoṣito me tanurapi vṛddhaguruṃ jagatsmaritvā /
K08bsu029_u:509: suruciramaśanaṃ mayā na bhuktaṃ mokṣita ātma gajā yadā tadāsīt // 147 //
K08bsu029_u:510: ṛkṣapatirabhūva śailadurge himahata sapta dināni rakṣito me /
K08bsu029_u:511: puruṣa vadhaku tena me prayukto na ca pratighāta kṛtaśca me tadāsmin // 148 //
K08bsu029_u:513: sa viṣeṇa śareṇa ca viddho daṃṣṭravarāṃstyajamāna na dviṣṭaḥ // 149 //
K08bsu029_u:517: gaṅgataraṅgajalairhiyamāṇaḥ tārita me yada āsi mṛgatve /
K08bsu029_u:518: vadhakā mama tenapanītā naiva mano mama tatra praduṣṭam // 151 //
K08bsu029_u:520: taiśca hataḥ kṣudhitaiśca tadāhaṃ kacchapayonigato 'pi ca maitraḥ // 152 //
K08bsu029_u:521: bodhicariṃ caramāṇahu pūrvaṃ matsya babhūva yadā jalacarī /
K08bsu029_u:524: sattva kṛtāḥ sukhitā nirujāśca prāṇaku saumya tadā ca yadāsīt // 154 //
K08bsu029_u:525: siṃha babhūva yadā mṛgarājā sthāmabalānvita kāruṇikaśca /
K08bsu029_u:526: viddha śareṇa na dūṣita cittaṃ maitri tadā vadhake 'pi tadā me // 155 //
K08bsu029_u:527: śaṅkhatuṣāranibho hayarājā āsi purā ca samudrataṭe 'ham /
K08bsu029_u:528: rākṣasimadhyagatā vaṇijo me tārita kṛtva kṛpāṃ karuṇāṃ ca // 156 //
K08bsu029_u:529: bodhicariṃ caramāṇa janārthe āsi kuṇāla ahaṃ yada pakṣī /
K08bsu029_u:530: varjita kāmaguṇā bahudoṣā no ca vaśaṃ pramadāna gato 'ham // 157 //
K08bsu029_u:531: āsi śaśo vanagulmanivāsī śāsatī taṃ sukṛte śaśavargam /
K08bsu029_u:533: āsi śuko drumapuṣpaphalāḍhyo śuṣkadrumo na ca me sa hi tyaktaḥ /
K08bsu029_u:534: dṛṣṭa kṛtajña tadā mama śakrastaṃ kṛtavāṃstaru patraphalāḍhyam // 159 //
K08bsu029_u:536: rājabhayāttu vimokṣita te me vānararāja ahaṃ yada āsīt // 160 //
K08bsu029_u:537: śuka bhūta purā guruhetoḥ śāli haraṃśca nareṇa gṛhītaḥ /
K08bsu029_u:538: kiṃ nu śukā harase mama śāli nāśayate 'pi ca pakṣi maśasyam ( matsasyam) // 161 //
K08bsu029_u:539: śuka so 'bravīdbhadra śṛṇuṣva caurya harāmi na te ahu śālim /
K08bsu029_u:540: jīrṇagurudvayapoṣaṇahetoḥ śāli harāmi kṛpārtha tu teṣām // 162 //
K08bsu029_u:542: bīja prakīrṇa yadā prathamaṃ te bhāga dadāmi sarvajanasya /
K08bsu029_u:543: tacca giraṃ vadato mama śrutvā tenāpi caurya bhavenna kadācit // 163 //
K08bsu029_u:544: sādhu śukā hara śāli yatheṣṭaṃ durlabha mānuṣa yasyimu bhaktiḥ /
K08bsu029_u:545: mānuṣa tvaṃ maya tīryagatehā sādhu damaḥ śama saṃyama tubhyam // 164 //
K08bsu029_u:546: ityevamāni caritāni pūrva caranta duṣkara kṛtāni /
K08bsu029_u:547: na ca me manasi tatra bhavi kheda eṣata uttamāṃ viraja bodhim // 165 //
K08bsu029_u:548: ādhyātmikaṃ hyatha ca bāhyaṃ nāsti hi vastu yanmayā na dattam /
K08bsu029_u:549: śīle ca kṣānti tatha vīrya dhyāna upāya prajña carito 'ham // 166 //
K08bsu029_u:550: māṃsaṃ tvacaṃ tathapi ca majja śoṇitameva datta svaśarīrāt /
K08bsu029_u:551: prānte guhāsu ca yadā me śoṣita āśrayo 'pi caratā me // 167 //
K08bsu029_u:552: dhutayāna deśita jinebhiḥ yatra prayujyato jina bhavanti /
K08bsu029_u:553: tatra dhute satataṃ ca prayukto āsi caranta pure ahu nityam // 168 //
K08bsu029_u:554: etādṛśā vrata udārā ye ca niṣevitā caratā me /
K08bsu029_u:555: śrutvā ca teṣamimāścaryamekapade na bhaviṣyati chandaḥ // 169 //
K08bsu029_u:556: hāsyu bhaviṣyati ima śruṇitvā śāsanametadeva ca taḍānīm /
K08bsu029_u:559: śrutvā ca dharmamima śāntaṃ naiṣa jinokta ityabhivadanti // 171 //
K08bsu029_u:560: ācāryo me śrutasamudro āsi bahuśrutaḥ kathikaśreṣṭhaḥ /
K08bsu029_u:561: tenāpi caiṣa pratiṣiddho buddhavaco hi naiṣa tu kathaṃcit // 172 //
K08bsu029_u:562: parato 'pyabhūdapi ca vṛddhaḥ tasya guruḥ sa śāmitaguṇaughaḥ /
K08bsu029_u:563: tenāpi naiṣa hi gṛhīto mātra prayujyatha vitathametat // 173 //
K08bsu029_u:564: yatrātma nāsti na ca jīvo deśita pudgalo 'pi na kathaṃcit /
K08bsu029_u:565: vyarthaḥ śramo 'tra ghaṭate yaḥ śīlaprayoga saṃvarakriyā ca // 174 //
K08bsu029_u:566: yadyasti caiva mahāyānaṃ nātra hi ātma sattva manujo vā /
K08bsu029_u:567: vyarthaḥ śramo 'tra hi kṛto me yatra na cātmasattvaupalabdhiḥ // 175 //
K08bsu029_u:569: bhāṣeta no jina kadācit vācamimāṃ hi bhikṣuparibhāṣām // 176 //
K08bsu029_u:571: bhavitā hi bhikṣava mameha śāsani īrṣyamānamadadagdhāḥ // 177 //
K08bsu029_u:575: buddhasya te dhvaja gṛhītvā sevakarā gṛhasthajanatāyām /
K08bsu029_u:576: lekhaṃ vahanti satataṃ te śāsanadaṃ vihāya guṇarāśim / 179 //
K08bsu029_u:579: naiṣāmanāryamapi vācyaṃ naiva ca kiṃcidasti yadakāryam /
K08bsu029_u:580: staupika sāṃghikaṃ hyapi ca vittaṃ paugdalikaṃ ca yacca samameṣām // 181 //
K08bsu029_u:581: bhikṣuṇa vīkṣya ca guṇāḍhyaṃ teṣvapi cāpyavarṇa kathayanti /
K08bsu029_u:582: duḥśīla vañcaka praviśya kuhāste strī ca vināśayanti hi sughorāḥ // 182 //
K08bsu029_u:583: gṛddho gṛhīṇa tathā kāmairyādṛśe pravrajitva te gṛddhāḥ /
K08bsu029_u:584: bhāryāṃ sutā duhitaraśca teṣu bhaviṣya gṛhisamānam // 183 //
K08bsu029_u:587: kāmā ime khalu na sevyāḥ pātana tiryakpretanirayeṣu /
K08bsu029_u:588: vakṣyanti te sada gṛhīṇāṃ te ca svayamadānta anupaśāntāḥ // 185 //
K08bsu029_u:589: svayameva te yatha adāntāḥ śiṣyagaṇo 'pi teṣa na sudāntaḥ /
K08bsu029_u:591: sevārthameva na guṇārthaṃ te khalu saṃgrahaṃ dadati teṣām /
K08bsu029_u:592: śiṣyagaṇaiḥ svakaiḥ parivṛto 'haṃ pūja jane sadātra cala sidhya // 187 //
K08bsu029_u:593: kathayanti te 'pi ca janasya saṃgraha eṣa me karuṇayaiṣām /
K08bsu029_u:594: upasthāma prārthayāmi tebhya śiṣyagaṇebhya eva na kadācit // 188 //
K08bsu029_u:596: pravrajiṣyanti narakeṣu āgatā āgatā sada anāryāḥ // 189 //
K08bsu029_u:598: gṛhiṇo na te 'pi vna ca bhikṣū varjita te yathā śmaśāna iva dāruḥ // 190 //
K08bsu029_u:599: śikṣāsu cādara na teṣāṃ syānna ca prātimokṣavinaye vā /
K08bsu029_u:601: vanavāsināmapi hi teṣāṃ grāmagataṃ bhaviṣyati hi cittam /
K08bsu029_u:602: kleśāgninā prapatitānāṃ cittamavasthitaṃ hi na ca teṣām // 192 //
K08bsu029_u:603: vismṛtya buddhaguṇa sarvān śikṣadhutāṃśca te 'pi ca upāyāna /
K08bsu029_u:608: dhyānaṃ tathādhyayanaṃ tyaktvā nitya vihārakarmaṇi niyuktāḥ /
K08bsu029_u:610: na ca karmiko hyahaṃ vihāre ātmana hetureṣa hi kṛto me /
K08bsu029_u:613: damasaṃyame satatayuktāḥ saṃgraha teṣu te na kurute ca // 197 //
K08bsu029_u:615: saṃmodikasya ca mamedaṃ gaccha na te 'sti vāsa iha kaścit // 198 //
K08bsu029_u:616: śayyāsanaṃ nikhila dattaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sthāpitā iha prabhūtāḥ /
K08bsu029_u:617: na ca lābhasaṃbhava ihāsti kiṃ paribhokṣyase 'tra vraja bhikṣo // 199 //
K08bsu029_u:618: śayyāsanoddiśana teṣāṃ naiva bhaviṣyate 'pi ca kadācit /
K08bsu029_u:620: nirbhartsitā pi ca samantātte hi mamaurasāścarimakāle /
K08bsu029_u:621: vacanaṃ na caite mam hi smṛtvā prāntavane tadābhinivasanti // 201 //
K08bsu029_u:622: hā śāsanaṃ jinavarasya nāśamupekṣya hi nacireṇa /
K08bsu029_u:623: lābhābhibhūta guṇadviṣṭā bhikṣavaḥ prādurbhūta bahu yatra // 202 //
K08bsu029_u:626: sada satkṛtā guṇavihīnā bhedaka sūcakāḥ kalahakāmāḥ /
K08bsu029_u:627: te śāstṛsaṃmata janasya te ca bhaviṣyanti mānamadadagdhāḥ // 204 //
K08bsu029_u:630: ratnākaro yatha viluptaḥ sthāsyati padminīva pariśuṣkā /

K08bsu029_u:747: tena khalu punā rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśminā rājakumāreṇa saptabhirdivasaiḥ sarvaśilpānyadhigatāni yāvanti laukikāni //

K08bsu029_u:1143: kalpānacintya śatāśca koṭiyo vrata cīrṇā buddhakoṭiśatāśca satkṛtā bahukalpān /
K08bsu029_u:1144: yaṣṭā yajñaśatā acintiyāparimāṇā kāyastena tavābhirājate abhirūpaḥ // 331 //
K08bsu029_u:1145: dānaśīlasamādhiprajñayāpi ca kṣāntyā vīryadhyānamupāyaśodhitaṃ tava rūpam /
K08bsu029_u:1146: candrārkamaṇidyutiprabhā na virāji śakrabramhaprabhā na bhāsate purataste // 332 //
K08bsu029_u:1147: rūpaṃ darśayate manoramaṃ jagadarthe pratibhāsodakacandrasaṃnibhaṃ yatha māyā /
K08bsu029_u:1148: sarvāsveva ca dikṣu dṛśyate jinakāyo no cā rūpapramāṇu dṛśyate sugatānām // 333 //
K08bsu029_u:1149: tuṣiteṣu kvacideva dṛśyase nivasaṃstvaṃ vyūḍhamānaśca punaḥ supāṇḍaragajabhūtaḥ /
K08bsu029_u:1150: mātu kukṣigataśca dṛśyase 'pi ca vīraḥ sarvatrānugato mahāmune nabhatulyaḥ // 334 //
K08bsu029_u:1151: jātiṃ saṃdarśayase kvacidbhavān diśatāsu gacchan sapta padāni dṛśyase kvacidurvyām /
K08bsu029_u:1152: hyeṣṭho 'haṃ sanarāmare jage atidevo mociṣye jaga duḥkhasāgarādgira muñcan // 335 //
K08bsu029_u:1153: dharmasaṃśayu nāsti te mune kvacideva śikṣāṃ cāpi ca loka dṛśyate lipijñāne śāntaṃ dhyānasamādhigocaramanuprāptaṃ strīṇāṃ madhyagataśca dṛśyate kvacideva // 336 //
K08bsu029_u:1154: tyaktvā mātāpitā mahītale pramadāśca jñātīn śokahatān vimūrcchitān viruvantaḥ /
K08bsu029_u:1155: niṣkrānto vanavāsamīkṣyase padamekaṃ devākoṭiśataiḥ parivṛto varasattvaḥ // 337 //
K08bsu029_u:1156: mārāste caturo 'pi nirjitāścirakālaṃ mārān dharṣayamāṇa dṛśyate 'pi ca kṣetre /
K08bsu029_u:1157: cakraṃ vartayase 'pyacintiyaṃ purimeṇa cakraṃ vartayamāna dṛśyase kṛpayā tvam // 338 //
K08bsu029_u:1159: nityaṃ śāśvatadṛṣṭisaṃjñitaṃ jagadīkṣya nirvāsya iti vāca bhāṣase pariṣatsu /
K08bsu029_u:1160: saṃsārābhirataṃ jagatsatatamīkṣya śāntāṃ śītagatiṃ ca nirvṛtiṃ vadasi tvam // 339 //
K08bsu029_u:1161: puṇyajñānamupāyaprajñato na samaste sphurase kāyaprabhāya tvaṃ mune bahukṣetrān /
K08bsu029_u:1162: bhāṣante tava varṇa nāyakā diśatāsu vande tvāmasamantagocaraṃ munirājam // 340 //
K08bsu029_u:1163: vandāmo 'pi ca dharmatāmakhilaprāptaṃ sarvasattvakriyāsu dṛśyase yatha māyā /
K08bsu029_u:1164: na ca te 'styāgamanaṃ kvacidgamanaṃ vā māyādharma sati pratiṣṭhitamabhivande // 341 //
K08bsu029_u:1165: sādhu tvaṃ naravīra bhāṣase varamārgaṃ bodhiryena varā hyavāpyate jagadarthe /
K08bsu029_u:1166: etāmapyahamāśu dharmatāmanubuddhā deśeyaṃ naravīraṃ dhamatāṃ jagadarthe // 342 //
K08bsu029_u:1167: sarvajñaṃ vigatajvaraṃ naravīraṃ yasya nāsti samaḥ kuto 'dhikastribhave 'smin /
K08bsu029_u:1168: stutvā puṇyamupārjitaṃ mayā yadiha tena śāntāṃ bodhivarāmanuttarāṃ spṛśatu lokaḥ // 343 //
K08bsu029_u:1169: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla sa tathāgataḥ siddhārthabuddhiḥ rājño 'rciṣmato 'dhyāśayaṃ viditvā tathā dharmaṃ deśayāmāsa yathā sarve avaivartikā abhūvannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau //
K08bsu029_u:1170: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmī rājakumārastaṃ bhagavantaṃ siddhārthabuddhiṃ tathāgatametadavocat - adhivāsayatu bhagavānasmākāṃ nagare śvobhaktena
K08bsu029_u:1171: adhivāsayati ca bhagavān puṇyaraśme rājakumārasya tūṣṇībhāvenānukampāmupādāya //
K08bsu029_u:1172: atha khalu puṇyaraśmī rājakumārastau mātāpitarau tāśva pramadā āmantrayati sma - anumodayantu bhavantaḥ sarve sahitāḥ sarve samagrāḥ /
K08bsu029_u:1175: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmī rājakumāro yathālaṃkṛtaṃ ratipradhānaṃ nagaraṃ tathāgatāya niryātayati sma anapekṣaḥ /
K08bsu029_u:1176: pañcarasaśatavyūhena ca bhojanena taṃ tathāgataṃ pratipādayati sma sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
K08bsu029_u:1177: sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ saptaratnacitān vihārān kārayāmāsa maṇicaṃkramān prajñaptānupari ca ratnajālavitānavitatān vāmadakṣiṇena puṣpavṛkṣasupariniṣṭhitān
K08bsu029_u:1180: ekaikasya ca bhikṣorabhivandya cīvaro dīyate sma ekaikaḥ /
K08bsu029_u:1186: na vyāpādavitarkaṃ na vihiṃsāvitarkaṃ na rājyatṛṣṇām /
K08bsu029_u:1190: na ca dvirapi sa tathāgataḥ pṛṣṭaḥ /
K08bsu029_u:1191: etasminnantare na snāto na sarpitailena vā gātraṃ mrakṣitam,
K08bsu029_u:1195: yasmiṃśca samaye sa tathāgataḥ parinirvṛtastasmin samaye lohitacandranasya citā kāritā /
K08bsu029_u:1196: yatra sa tathāgato dhmāpitastasminneva ca pṛthivipradeśe varṣaśatasahasraṃ dhātūnāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtavān /
K08bsu029_u:1197: sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ sarvapuṣpaiḥ sarvamālyaiḥ sarvagandhaiḥ sarvavādyairyāvat sarvapūjāsatkārān kṛtvā pañcāccaturnavatiḥ stūpakoṭyaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitavān
K08bsu029_u:1198: te ca stūpāḥ saptaratnamayā ratnajālasaṃchannā muktājālavitānavitatāḥ /
K08bsu029_u:1199: saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ pañca pañca chatraśatānyekaikasmin stūpe āropitavān /
K08bsu029_u:1204: anenopāyena varṣakoṭiṃ pūjāṃ kṝtvāḥ tataḥ pravrajitaḥ /
K08bsu029_u:1209: tena nirāmiṣacittena catako varṣakoṭyo dharmadānaṃ dattam /
K08bsu029_u:1215: tasya cānuśikṣitvā sarvajanapado 'ntaḥpuraṃ sarvapādamūlaṃ sarvasahāyāśca pravrajitāḥ //
K08bsu029_u:1216: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla śūddhāvāsakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāmetadabhavat - puṇyaraśmeranuśikṣamāṇaḥ sarvarājyajanakadaḥ pravrajitaḥ /
K08bsu029_u:1220: sarvasya puṇyaraśminā bhikṣuṇā buddhasahasrasya caivaṃrūpā pūjā kṛtābhūt //
K08bsu029_u:1221: syātkhalu punaste rāṣṭrapāla etarhi kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayenārciṣmān nāma rājābhūt /
K08bsu029_u:1224: amitāyuḥ sa tathāgatastena kālena tena samayenārciṣmānnāma rājābhūt /
K08bsu029_u:1225: syātkhalu punaste rāṣṭrapāla - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṇyaraśmirnāma rājakumāro 'bhūt /
K08bsu029_u:1228: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṇyaraśmirnāma rājakumāro 'bhūt /
K08bsu029_u:1231: (Vaidya, RP 159) tasmāttarhi rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena
K08bsu029_u:1234: tatte 'nabhiyuktā lābhasatkāraślokagurukā jñātyadhyavasitā mānahatā lābhahatāstapasvino vihanyante,
K08bsu029_u:1236: nirarthakaṃ pravrajitāḥ śramaṇadūṣakā bodhisattvakhaṭukāḥ kāyavākcittavaṅkāḥ naimittikāḥ
K08bsu029_u:1238: ahrīkā anapatrapā acāritrā asaddharmaprasṛtā gocaravirahitā buddhagocarāddūrībhūtā buddhajñānavirahitāḥ mokṣacittavirahitāḥ bodhicittavirahitāḥ
K08bsu029_u:1239: tasmāttarhi rāṣṭrapāla imamevaṃrūpaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā boddhavyam - pāpamitrānyudyuktāni na sevitavyāni lābhārthikānām //
K08bsu029_u:1240: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K08bsu029_u:1242: hitvā bodhiṃ guṇaśatanicitāṃ lābhārthaṃ te parakulanicatāḥ // 344 //
K08bsu029_u:1243: dhvāṅkṣā duṣṭā hrīdhṛtirahitā kṣetrārthaṃ te namucivaśagatāḥ /
K08bsu029_u:1245: kāyo 'raṇye smṛtirapi nagare lābhārthaṃ te caritavikalpe /
K08bsu029_u:1246: dūre mokṣo nabha iva dharaṇi dūre jāhu bhujagavadetān // 346 //
K08bsu029_u:1247: buddho dharmo na ca priyavadatāṃ tadvatsaṃgho guṇaśatabharitaḥ /
K08bsu029_u:1249: śrutvaināṃ mama cārikāṃ samupadiṣṭāṃ bhūtādhyāśayato 'tra yujyathā pratipattyā /
K08bsu029_u:1251: yo hīcchedvarabodhi budhyituṃ varayāne smāryāstena mahīpate guṇāstasya /
K08bsu029_u:1252: saṃcintya yathābhūta yoniśaḥ sthātavyamevaṃ bodhi asaṅga ridhyate sugatānām // 349 //
K08bsu029_u:1253: āryaṃ vaṃśaṃ niṣevate guṇaprekṣī jñānaṃ tatra utpādayecchu ivātra /
K08bsu029_u:1254: mā evaṃ pravijahya śāsanaṃ guṇamaṇḍaṃ sarvāsvetagatīṣu pañcasū yatha bālāḥ // 350 //
K08bsu029_u:1256: śailāraṇyaguhānijāsino bhavateha tatrasthāśca ma ātma manyathā paṭapaṃsī /
K08bsu029_u:1257: ātmānaṃ paribhāṣathā satatanitya - manusmaranto buddhakoṭi virāgitā purimā ye // 351 //
K08bsu029_u:1258: kāye jīvita tṛṣṇa utsṛha anapekṣā dharme yujyata tīvra gauravaṃ janayitvā /
K08bsu029_u:1259: pratipattiśca mayāpi bhāṣitā iha sūtre paścā bodhi na teṣu durlabhā iha sthitvā // 352 //
K08bsu029_u:1260: ye yuktāśca ihāpi harṣitā jinayāne śrutvā yukta sudurmanā bhavitāraḥ /
K08bsu029_u:1261: tasmādvai janayeta śāsane adhimuktiṃ mā paścādanutāpa bheṣyathā vicaramāṇāḥ // 353 //
K08bsu029_u:1262: yaśca punā rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvaḥ pañcapāramitāsu caret,
K08bsu029_u:1263: yaśceha dharmaparyāyapratipatyā saṃpādayet - ahamatra śikṣiṣye 'hamatra saṃvare sthāsyāmi /
K08bsu029_u:1264: eṣa puṇyaskandho 'sya puṇyaskandhasya purataḥ śatatamāmapi kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamāmapi śatasahasratamāmapi koṭiśatasahasratamāmapi,
K08bsu029_u:1265: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upanisāmapi dhṛtipadamapi nopaiti /
K08bsu029_u:1266: asmin khalu punardharmaparyāye bhāsyamāṇe triṃśatāṃ niyutānāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāśca prajāyā anutpadantapūrvāṇyanuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpannāni
K08bsu029_u:1269: atha khalu āyuṣmān rāṣṭrapālo bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃnāmāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ,
K08bsu029_u:1271: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ rāṣṭrapālametadavocat - amoghapratijñāviśuddhamiti nāma dhāraya /
K08bsu029_u:1275: āttamanā āyuṣmān rāṣṭrapālaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan //
